'''v0.11.0 alpha build 2''' is the second build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.11.0 alpha|v0.11.0]].

== Additions ==
* Added View-bobbing slider in the menu.

== Fixes ==

'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15311 19 bugs fixed]'''

* Fixed startup crash for old worlds
* Wolves are no longer angry after killing a target
* Fixed bugs with tamed animals not being tame
* Fixed several collision checks
* FishHook now despawns on game exit
* Fixed arrows crashing the game
* Fixed arrows being picked up by the player in mid-air

'''From the previous development version'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8170}} - Sounds are played twice
* {{bug|MCPE-8172}} - Water and lava are in a block far away from where the texture is
* {{bug|MCPE-8173}} - Skeleton shoot arrows to themselves
* {{bug|MCPE-8174}} - Cannot play on LAN
* {{bug|MCPE-8185}} - Destroying a furnace with items in it crashes the game
* {{bug|MCPE-8205}} - Crash with invalid or no skin.
* {{bug|MCPE-8226}} - Players do not lose status effects particles while they die
* {{bug|MCPE-8271}} - Time for potions is not shown correctly
* {{bug|MCPE-8272}} - Armor leggings not showing
* {{bug|MCPE-8276}} - Trunks are missing in spruce trees
* {{bug|MCPE-8278}} - Double click to browse skins crashes the game
* {{bug|MCPE-8331}} - Multiplayer crashes when another tablet is joining my world to ride the boat with my brother</onlyinclude>
